problem_text_cn: 如图,小明站在C处看甲乙两楼楼顶上的点A和点E,C、E、A三点在同一条直线上,点B,D分别在点E,A的正下方,B,C相距20米,D,C相距40米,乙楼高BE为15米,甲楼高AD()米(忽略小明身高)
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaoming stands at C and looks at point A and point E on the tops of buildings A and B. The three points C, E, and A are in the same straight line, and points B and D are directly below points E and A, respectively. , C is N_0 apart, D and C are N_1 apart, the height of the second building BE is N_2, the height of the first building is AD() (ignoring Xiaoming's height)
raw_comment: 本题考查相似三角形性质的应用．解题时关键是找出相似的三角形,然后根据对应边成比例列出方程,建立适当的数学模型来解决问题．
